              String TSLWorkingDirectoryPath,
              String jdbcURL,
              String jdbcDriverClass)
                throws iaik.xml.crypto.tsl.ex.TSLEngineDiedException
        Description copied from interface: TSLConnectorInterface
        Initial the MOA TSL Connector.
        The hashcache directory must be set via "System-Property "iaik.xml.crypto.tsl.BinaryHashCache.DIR"!!!
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface TSLConnectorInterface
        Parameters:
        euTSLURL - - URL to TrustList
        TSLWorkingDirectoryPath - - Path to a folder which should be used by the TSL engine. (/A/B/.../)

        jdbcDriverClass - - ...

                                                           iaik.xml.crypto.tsl.ex.TSLSearchException
        Description copied from interface: TSLConnectorInterface
        Perform an update of all certificates which are on EU TSL and all MS TSLs and create an locale TSL database. The old locale TSL database is removed and a new database is created.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        dateTime - - ...
        serviceLevelStatus - - String Array of ServiceLevelStatus. For example new String[]{"accredited","undersupervision"}

      • checkQC

        public boolean checkQC(X509Certificate[] chain)
                throws iaik.xml.crypto.tsl.ex.TSLSearchException,
                       iaik.xml.crypto.tsl.ex.TSLEngineDiedException
        Description copied from interface: TSLConnectorInterface
        Check the http://uri.etis.org/TrstSvc/Svctype/CA/QC characteristic of a certificate by using the TSL information. This method uses information from the local TSL database.
        Specified by:
        checkQC in interface TSLConnectorInterface
        Parameters:
        chain - - An X509 certificate.
        Returns:
        Return true, if the certificate comprises the http://uri.etis.org/TrstSvc/Svctype/CA/QC characteristic.
        Throws:
        iaik.xml.crypto.tsl.ex.TSLSearchException
        iaik.xml.crypto.tsl.ex.TSLEngineDiedException

        Description copied from interface: TSLConnectorInterface
        Check the http://uri.etis.org/TrstSvc/eSigDir-1999-93-ECTrustedList/SvcInfoExt/QCWithSSCD characteristic of a certificate by using the TSL information. This method uses information from the local TSL database.
        Specified by:
        checkSSCD in interface TSLConnectorInterface

        Returns:
